Title: Requires insurers to make insurance premium refunds and other adjustments to all policyholders adversely impacted by COVID-19
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of financial services to require insurers to make insurance premium refunds and other adjustments for all policyholders adversely impacted by COVID-19.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring insurers to make insurance premium refunds and other adjustments to all policyholders adversely impacted by COVID-19
